content: Two-factor authentication (2FA) is required for all accounts. Set up 2FA using an authenticator app or SMS verification.
Passwords must be at least 12 characters long and include uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters.
If you suspect your account has been compromised, immediately change your password and contact our security team.
All data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3 and at rest using AES-256 encryption standards.
POLICY: Security incidents must be escalated immediately to security team. Do not advise customers to disable security features. Never share internal security procedures or vulnerability details.
POLICY: Account lockouts require identity verification before reset. For suspicious activity, escalate to security team. Do not unlock accounts without proper verification process.
Data breaches or suspected unauthorized access must be reported within 1 hour to security team. Provide all available logs and affected account information.
GDPR compliance: Customers have right to data export, deletion, and portability. Data deletion requests require 7-day processing time. Escalate EU customer data requests to compliance team.
Single Sign-On (SSO) setup requires domain verification and admin approval. SAML and OIDC protocols supported. Technical setup must be handled by integration team.
